items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy material at the waistline
items.body: Ordered xl for a medium person but it has some stretch to it so large would have been the better choice,seems to be quality for the price Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price.
items.body: This is a cute little pajama set. There is not much too it. The material is obviously thin and very see through. The material is okay, it is relatively soft. The cut is pretty basic. The bottoms are just loose shorts. The top does have adjustable straps and fits close over the breasts. The bottom part of the top is not form fitted. This is not the greatest piece of lingerie, but I am giving it 5 stars because the quality is on par with the price, and you pretty much exactly what the listing shows. So, it is pretty good for the price. We ordered a size small, which is my wife's usual size, and it fit well/as expected. For reference, my wife is a 5'2", 110-115 lbs, Bra Size 36A, Waist 28 inches, Hips 37 inches. I will try to post some pictures if they will let me. Read more
items.author: 2L student

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy, Comfortable, and a Great Value
items.body: I picked up these PJs for my wife and wow—she looks incredible in them. Wish I could share how nice they look! They’re just sheer enough to get the imagination running, while still being classy and elegant. She doesn’t usually wear lingerie because it tends to be too tight, but she said the top on this set fits comfortably and feels soft against her skin. I could see it looking great layered over a bra and underwear too, but honestly, I love them just the way they are. This is a fantastic value for a two-piece set that’s both sexy and comfortable. Pros • Beautiful floral lace design adds elegance and allure • Sheer fabric gives a sexy yet tasteful look • Comfortable fit — not tight or restrictive • Breathable and lightweight for lounging or sleep • Great value for a two-piece set Cons • None so far Verdict A perfect balance of comfort and seduction. These pajamas are soft, flattering, and see-through in all the right places — a definite win if you’re looking to surprise someone (or yourself). Read more
items.author: Rich D.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but bottoms are not really shorts
items.body: Nic piece of lingerie and sizing appears to be accurate. However, the “shorts” fit more like cheeky underwear than shorts. The lace is nice and not scratchy and held up well in the wash. Read more
items.author: Brittany Downing

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy
items.body: 100% sheer and 100% sexy. This fire red lingerie is spicy. It’s delicate as you would expect but had no defects. Small was true to size. Read more
items.author: GJG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice!
items.body: Nice feel! Light weight! Very good fit! Good quality! Read more
items.author: Tony

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flirty & Comfortable – Perfect Purple Lace Pajama Set
items.body: This purple lace pajama set is beautiful, comfortable, and fits just right. The floral lace design is elegant yet sexy, and the sheer material feels soft and lightweight. The cami and shorts both fit true to size (medium) and are perfect for lounging or a romantic night in. The color is even prettier in person, and the quality feels great for the price. Read more
items.author: TSO

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Purple, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
